info_no_stack_defined: You don't have any stacks defined.
activator_info_1: You can check status of your device by reading QR-code from the device.
activator_info_3: You can check status and deactivate active devices.
check_device_info_1: You can check status of your device by reading QR-code from the device.
first_use_info_2: Start with adding your first stack information.
first_use_info_2_1:
Please find stack
information
from your email
note_message_sensor_not_in_stack: This device cannot be found under your stack:
deactivate_note_message:
You are going to deactivate this sensor and set installation status as uninstalled.

Are you sure you want to deactivate?
activate_note_message:
You are going to activate this sensor and set installation status as installed.

Are you sure you want to activate?
confirmation_query_replace_device_with_n: Are you sure that you want to uninstall this device and replace it with a new one?
error_message_same_device: Same device. Please read QR code from the device that replaces the current one.
confirmation_query_replace_current_devic: Do you want to replace current device with this one:
confirmation_query_remove_device_from_gr:
You are going to remove this devide from deployment group.

Removed device will be moved to unassigned deployment group.

Are you sure you want to remove?
deployment_group_create_info:
Create new Deployment group 
by selecting country prefix and 
defining individual name and description for the group.
error_message_group_info_missing: Some mandatory information missing, please check the that you have filled and selected all information.
error_message_group_already_exists: Group already exists, please change the name of the group to be created.
confirmation_query_remove_deployment_gro: You are about to remove this Deployment Group. All the devices assigned to this group will be moved to 'unassigned' group. Are you sure you want to remove this Deployment Group?
error_message_installation_info_missing: Some mandatory information missing. Please check that you have installation name and Deployment Group defined.
create_new_installation_info: Create a new installation by defining a name for the installation and select Deployment Group to be used for the devices to be installed. You can also add optional description for the installation.
confirmation_query_delete_installation_f: Are you sure you want to delete this installation? Note: this will only delete local file containing information related to this installation.
error_message_camera_permission_not_gran: You didn't provide permission to access camera.
error_message_storage_permission_not_gra: You didn't provide permission to access storage.
confirmation_query_remove_device_from_in: Are you sure you want to remove device from the installation? This will also uninstall device from the system.
confirmation_query_install_even_already_: This device has been installed at some point. Are you sure you want to proceed to installation of this device?
error_message_device_already_in_installa: This device is already listed in this installation.
no_stacks:
No stacks added.

Add your first stack by selecting 'New stack' from the menu
stacks_query_remove_message:
You are going to remove this stack from your application. Stack is not removed from the back-end system and you can always add it again.

Are you sure you want to remove this stack?
